The IISc Gymkhana was host to the Gururao Deshpande Sangeet Mahotsav of 2010. The program consisted of an all night which began at about 9.30 PM and went on till 7:30 AM the next morning. concert in the Gymkhana main hall.













Sarangi Solo by Morad Ali
















Dr. Prabha Atre










Uday Bhavalkar
The concluding recital at the event was by Pt. Vinayak Torvi.
